page.title: 04HOUSING IN THE AREA.
page.content: There is a very wide variety of housing within the area and this is reflected in the price range that is available from Â£20,000 to Â£100,000. There is no council housing within the area.The centre of West Kirby comprises mainly of low cost older terraced housing with some very large semi-detached older properties many of which have been converted into flats. Many of these flats and houses are available as rented accomodation. There has been some more modern development in West Kirby and there are large numbers of more expensive detached properties. Caldy is a high priced luxury housing area where the price of houses can be well over Â£100,000. Newton has three large estates and some smaller developments of detached and semi-detached housing.
